title: Cryzen.io
description: A fast-paced online multiplayer first-person shooter with team deathmatch modes and character customization.

title: Kour.io
description: A multiplayer IO FPS game with intense battles across various maps and game modes.

title: Nut Simulator
description: A quirky simulation game where players manage and grow various types of nuts through resource management and upgrades.

title: Shell Shockers
description: An online multiplayer FPS where players control egg-shaped characters in humorous fast-paced combat.

title: Idle Breakout
description: An idle clicker game combining classic brick breaking with automated ball upgrades to destroy billions of bricks.

title: Diablo 1
description: The classic dungeon-crawler RPG where players battle demons, collect loot, and level up in gothic underground depths.

title: Clicker Heroes
description: An idle clicker game where players slay monsters, upgrade heroes, and progress through zones while building massive damage numbers.

title: Trimps
description: A unique incremental game combining resource management with combat as players manage small creatures called Trimps.

title: Tube Clicker
description: An incremental clicking game focused on building a YouTube-like video platform empire through content creation and monetization.

title: GrindCraft
description: A Minecraft-inspired incremental game where players automate resource gathering and crafting systems.

title: Hex GL
description: A futuristic 3D racing game inspired by F-Zero and Wipeout with high-speed anti-gravity ships racing through sleek tracks.

title: Idle Shooter
description: An idle shooting game where players automatically fire at enemies while upgrading weapons and abilities to progress through levels.

title: Masked Special Forces
description: A tactical FPS game featuring special forces operatives in various combat scenarios with realistic weapons and stealth mechanics.

title: Capybara Clicker
description: An idle clicker game centered around cute capybaras where players click to generate resources and unlock adorable capybara upgrades.

title: Block Blast
description: A puzzle game where players arrange and clear blocks by creating lines, combining match-three mechanics with strategic block placement.

title: Poly Track
description: A fun low poly version of Trackmania

title: Archer Hero
description: An archery-based action game where players control skilled archers, aiming and shooting arrows at targets and enemies with precision.

title: OpenGuessr
description: A geography guessing game where players use visual clues from street view images to guess locations around the world.

title: Go
description: Play the Japanese game of GO

title: Case Clicker 2
description: Open Counter Strike cases

title: Mr. Mine
description: A fun MMO style idle game
